name: Path of Light (thaon)
description:
Path of Light is a VR game inspired by Gorn, Star Wars and eastern philosophy of self discovery.

The core game revolves around a physics-based combat system with multiple enemy types, each with its unique attack and defence strategies.
This forces you to prioritize targets and always be aware of your surroundings if you want to survive long in the arena.

 It's a game that can be defined arcade, except there is no winning, there is only fighting, till the end.

The end, is for you to decide.
